<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>uploadUrlByArtefactId</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/artefacts/{artefactId}/upload"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns URL to upload content larger than 5 MB.
